lines.i: The Instructions section records instructions given to a patient. List patient decision aids here.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10112, CONF:10402 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.45"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15375)/@code="69730-0" Instructions (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15376)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry (CONF:10116, CONF:10117)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)
